1.0.name: wordpress/contentboxes
1.0.description:
With this plugin you can attach each post or page other posts. When you activate the plugin a new category is added called 'Contentbox', if you put a post in this category you can attach this post to any other page or post. The category is hidden in the loop / category list / next and previous posts so.

The plugin is development for people who use WordPress as a CMS like myself.
